author: benjaminion
content: It wouldn't be at all fair to punish attesters. For example a bad proposer could send one block to half the network, and a different block to the other half - neither side would know they were doing something wrong. The attesters to the block that got included will receive rewards as usual. Attesters to the other block will miss out on the correct head reward.
